meaningMnemonic: Having a keen <radical>eye</radical> for woodworking, you can tell that the <radical>bamboo</radical> from that <radical>tree</radical> over there will make an excellent <kanji>box</kanji>. Boxes made from bamboo trees are very sturdy and fashionable. You have an eye for fashion as well, you see.
readingMnemonic: Now you can use that <kanji>box</kanji> to store all your <reading>har</reading>d<reading>co</reading>re (はこ) punk vinyls. You’re a real connoisseur, so you know that hardcore music should only ever be kept in bamboo boxes.
